name: Renpy-Go
description:
Boardgame Go minigame for Ren'Py. Get the source code at https://github.com/limniris1/renpy-go.

Features:

Player vs. player and player vs. ai modes. Board sizes 9x9 and 19x19. The game can be run as a standalone or used as a minigame in another Ren'py game.

Ai:

The Go ai currently used in this project is a modified version of https://github.com/maksimKorzh/wally
